message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product at a price of $900,000. It's a unique opportunity for you, and I believe the value it brings will exceed the cost. Let me know what you think!
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $750,000 for the product. This is my best offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need a bit more than $750,000 to make this work.  Given the value this product provides, I'm willing to come down to $850,000.  I believe this is a fair price that benefits us both. Let's see if we can close this deal.

Alice, I understand your position, but $850,000 is still a bit high for me. Given my budget constraints, I'm willing to offer $820,000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.
